short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: List of markups to help you proper design your redmine pages, issues etc

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Redmine is a very powerful problem tracking tool. But this is not very intuitive. I fought a lot for simple formatting and tables. Readability improves perception. Rich formatting allows you to highlight important things. Redmine's standard layout is textile. Every time you need to format something, it is tedious to refer to the documentation!

So, I developed simple extension to help myself and others find markup tips&tricks!
